item.title: Paid, the AI agent ‘results-based billing’ startup from Manny Medina, raises huge $21M seed
item.description: Paid offers an interesting contribution to the AI agentic world: a platform for so-called "results-based" billing.

item.title: The AI services transformation may be harder than VCs think
item.description: Early warning signs suggest this whole services-industry metamorphosis may be more complicated than VCs anticipate.

item.title: DJI loses lawsuit over classification as Chinese military company
item.description: A federal judge has rejected drone maker DJI’s efforts to get off a Department of Defense list of Chinese military companies.

item.title: The billion-dollar infrastructure deals powering the AI boom
